page.title: 04HOME LIFE 3 BISHOP THORNTON
page.content: {FOOD and HEALTH {Doctors have become concerned about {our diet because of the increase in {the number of deaths due to heart {disease. We have found out that most {of our 25 children eat a good balanced {diet.}4 children sometimes eat vegetarian meals but most children eat meat or fish and vegetables and fruit every day. 4 children eat only white bread, 8 children eat both white and brown bread but 13 children eat only fibre enriched wholemeal bread every day. Our favourite fruit is banana and our favourite vegetables are cauliflower and peas. We found out that 9 children go to bed before 7.30 and 2 children go to bed at 9.30 but most go to bed about 8.30. 7 parents smoke cigarettes which is very bad for their health but we are trying to persuade them to stop.
